title: How to Do the Boom Snap Clap Hand Game

steps.headline: Hit your upper chest with a fist or open palm.
Hit your upper chest two times.
Put your right finger to your mouth.
Put it all together, doing the motions in-sync.
steps.description: "Boom, snap, clap. Ba-boom, snap, clap, snap. Boom, snap, clap. Ba-boom, snap, shh!" Then repeat. If you don't get it, try asking someone to teach you or just keep practicing!

text: Hit your upper chest with a fist or open palm. Boom! Snap with your right hand. Snap! Clap your hands together. Clap! Hit your upper chest two times. Ba-boom! Snap. Snap! Clap. Clap! Snap. Snap! Hit your chest. Boom! Snap. Snap! Clap. Clap! Hit your chest twice again. Ba-boom! Snap. Snap! Put your right finger to your mouth. Shh! Put it all together, doing the motions in-sync. "Boom, snap, clap. Ba-boom, snap, clap, snap. Boom, snap, clap. Ba-boom, snap, shh!" Then repeat. If you don't get it, try asking someone to teach you or just keep practicing!
